page.title: 10Halesworth Primary School
page.content: In 1923 Edgar Sewter was an area School but soon afterwards it was changed to a Primary School,then in 1981 it was changed to a first school.There are 10 Teachers including the Headmistress, with approx 230 children giving an average of 25 children in each class with an age range of 3-9. The school has gym apparatus and many other kinds of sports equipment.5 children go home for lunch,the rest have school lunches or bring packed.There are 9 classrooms plus a nursery and the school day starts at 8.55 and ends at 3.30.They have a colour television,a video and 2 computers.They also have a Library.The children on trips,enter competitions and have their work displayed in the town gallery.In the nursery is a dolls house and a toy shop.The children play many traditional games in the playground like hopscotch and marbles.
